titleStmt.title: Angliæ notitia, or The present state of England together with divers reflections upon the antient state thereof.
Angliae notitia. Part 1
titleStmt.author: Chamberlayne, Edward, 1616-1703.

publicationStmt.publisher: In the Savoy, printed by T.N. for John Martyn, and are to be sold at the sign of the Bell without Temple-Bar,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The present state of England.
Two more parts were issued subsequently. N.B.: Wing C1842A and C1844 are not by Chamberlayne and are supplements to rather than part of "Angliae notitia".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Bell without Temple-Bar
